metadata.title: CVE-2018-15727 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Grafana 2.x, 3.x, and 4.x before 4.6.4 and 5.x before 5.2.3 allowsauthentication bypass because an attacker can generate a valid "rememberme" cookie knowing only a username of an LDAP or OAuth user.

criterions.comment: grafana: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
